title: FURNISHED GUARD GATED MERIDIAN CONDO FOR RENT BEHIND FLAMINGO HOTEL
neighborhood: KOVAL & FLAMINGO 1 1/2 BLOCK FROM THE STRIP
posting_body: RENT: $1400 Fully Furnished  -- Minimum of 6 months lease (Negotiable)
AVAILABLE --
Now
Address is 270 East Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV 89169.
Walk one block to the heart of the Las Vegas strip.
1 bedroom, 1 bathroom luxury resort caliber fully furnished condo available for rent.
1 underground gated parking and plenty of on site parking
You will feel safe and your guests will be impressed by the professional security staff keeping a watchful eye 24 hours a day.
This particular unit is the Barcelona Model and approximately 696 square feet with stainless steel appliances.
GREAT LOCATION: Meridian Luxury Residences.

Just a short taxi ride to McCarran International Airport, this beautiful 16-acre property is also close to major businesses, convention centers, championship golf courses and the University of Nevada Las Vegas.
There is a gate that opens directly into Hughes Business Center.
You can walk a few minutes to work.
It is one block from the Las Vegas Strip and Bellagio Hotel and right next door to the Hughes Business Center.
Security deposit is $1400.
There is a $100 refundable deposit for keys.
Credit Check fee is $65.
CLEANING FEE IS $250.
Turnkey.
just bring your toothbrush and towels.
TENANT PAYS ALL UTILITIES EXCEPT WATER AND TRASH.
INCLUDES:
Double deck washer/dryer, granite counter tops, microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator, and 12 feet long mirrored closet.
Serious Renters only with FICO score above 650 and no felony conviction should inquire.
We do credit, criminal and eviction history with favorable positive results a must to be considered.
NO SMOKING, NO PET POLICY
Must have verifiable income and good rental history.
Turnkey, just bring your toothbrush.

This is a better alternative to mid-rise or high-rise condos like Allure, Sky Las Vegas, Panorama, Turnberry, MGM, Manhattan, Park Place, One Las Vegas, Park Ave, Palm Beach, The Ogden, Loft 5, Park, City Center, Queensridge, Veer, Vdara, Mandarin, Aria, Cosmo, Cosmopolitan, Crystals, The Martin, Juhl, Palm Beach, Solo, Trump, Soho, Newport and it is closer to the actions at Las Vegas Blvd "The Strip" casinos.
